name: Codeaholics
body:
### Codeaholics

We are a group of programmers from Hong Kong.
We meet up once a month to have a few talks, and chat.

### Join the Mailing List

Every day we are talking about the latest developments on the Web and Mobile.
Join us at [the Codeaholics Google Group](http://groups.google.com/group/codeaholics)!

### Facebook

We're also on facebook.
Come like [the Codeaholics Facebook page](https://www.facebook.com/codeaholics)

### Twitter

Follow [@Codeaholics](https://twitter.com/codeaholics) on Twitter for the latest news.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
